title: Hackers email stolen student data to parents of Nevada school district
description: The Clark County School District (CCSD) in Nevada is dealing with a potentially massive data breach, as hackers email parents their children's' data that was allegedly stolen during a recent cyberattack. [...]

title: HackerOne paid ethical hackers over $300 million in bug bounties
description: HackerOne has announced that its bug bounty programs have awarded over $300 million in rewards to ethical hackers and vulnerability researchers since the platform's inception. [...]
